example.eg: My consultation with the doctor was very brief.
example.egtrans: 我向医生的咨询很简短。

example.eg: We only have a brief report.
example.egtrans: 我们只有份简短的报告。

example.eg: I'm afraid we don't have much time left, you'll have to be brief.
example.egtrans: 恐怕我们没有太多时间了，你必须要言简意赅才行。

example.eg: Mrs. Winston thought the woman's dress was too brief for the venue.
example.egtrans: 温斯顿太太觉得那位女士的裙子太短了，不适合出席聚会。

example.eg: The concierge was very brief when I asked him about a good restaurant nearby.
example.egtrans: 当我询问礼宾部附近有没有不错的餐厅时，得到的是十分简短无礼的答复。

example.eg: The brief didn't provide any new information on the case.
example.egtrans: 简报并没有提供任何关于案件的新信息。

example.eg: Men's briefs and boxers are on sale today, but women's underwear is not.
example.egtrans: 今天男士的三角裤和平角裤有在打折，不过女士内衣没有。

example.eg: The Chief Inspector briefed her officers prior to the raid.
example.egtrans: 突袭前，总督察向手下警员简要介绍了情况。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向…简要介绍情况，对...作简报

example.eg: The chief briefed his agents on the recent developments of the case.
example.egtrans: 这名警长向他的代理人就案件近来的进展做了简要介绍。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向某人通告某事的基本情况，给某人做某事的情况简要介绍

dsense.name: brief
dsense.guideword: (law: statement of support) (美国律师自己准备的庭辩文件)

example.egtrans: 律师准备的诉讼要点很有说服力。
这位律师的职责是为她的客户进行辩护。

example.eg: The students' brief is to fill a sketchbook with drawings relating to their chosen theme.
example.egtrans: 作业概要要求学生按照选定的主题在速记本中画画。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作概要, 任务概要, 作业概要

example.eg: I'm not making a statement until I've talked to my brief.

dsense.name: catch a glimpse of [sth/sb], catch a brief glimpse of [sth/sb]

example.eg: I caught a glimpse of Peter as he walked past my house.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 瞥见, 很快地看…一眼
简而言之, 简单说来, 总之
简短评估, 快速评价
